metadata.description: Global AI acceptance and high-tech adoption scores by country, compiled from international surveys, readiness indices, and enterprise adoption data
sources: Lloyd's Register Foundation World Risk Poll 2021
Oxford Insights Government AI Readiness Index 2024
Stanford HAI Global AI Vibrancy Tool 2025
metadata.methodology: Weighted average based on source credibility (Pew/Stanford/ITU=VERY HIGH 1.0, Ipsos/Oxford/IMD=HIGH 0.85, Edelman/McKinsey=MEDIUM-HIGH 0.7) and recency (2025=1.0, 2024=0.9, 2023=0.7, 2021=0.35). Multiple data points per country are combined using these weights.
metadata.data_quality_note: Countries with direct survey data from Pew, Ipsos, or Edelman are marked confidence=high. Countries estimated from readiness indices and regional patterns are marked confidence=low. Lloyd's Register Foundation 2021 and EU AI Watch 2021 data flagged as historical baselines (pre-ChatGPT era). KPMG Q4 2026 data flagged as projected. New Zealand IMD duplicate removed (kept rank 27 only).
validation_applied: Fixed New Zealand duplicate in IMD rankings (kept rank 27 only)
Flagged KPMG Q4 2026 data as projected
Marked Lloyd's Register 2021 and EU AI Watch 2021 as historical baselines
Standardized country names and ISO codes

data_sources.methodology: Online survey, N=1000, Global Advisor platform
data_sources.survey_question: I am excited about products and services that use AI
